name: brett
coverLetter: I worked for a farm recently for 4 days.  So long enough to get the hang of it.  I was also doing harvesting as well so not all trimming.  The trim manager had the impression that I was moving in on his gf so I had to go.  Looking to get back out there tho.  Currently in a hotel looking for a place to live but if you offer shelter I will take it.  If not that's fine too.
